PSCT.Base: Once per turn, if you activate a "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap Card (except during the Damage Step): You can Set 1 "Fire Formation" Trap directly from your Deck. Once per turn: You can send 2 face-up "Fire Formation" Spells/Traps you control to the GY, then target 1 "Fire Fist" monster in your GY, except "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Dragon"; Special Summon that target.
